meta.name: The Festive Finish Line
meta.description: Roman Kemp hosts five festive episodes of the quiz, assisted by Sarah Greene. In each show, five celebrities race in moving podiums race across a Christmas-themed studio.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Christopher Biggins, Rachel Riley, Danny O'Carroll, Joel Mawhinney and Emily Campbell race in moving podiums in a festive episode of The Finish Line to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Tim Vine, Cheryl Baker, Kéllé Bryan, Will Best and Tia Kofi race in moving podiums in a festive episode of The Finish Line to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Russell Kane, Claire Richards, Josie d'Arby, David James and Jodie Grinham race in moving podiums in a festive episode of The Finish Line to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Joe Pasquale, Luxmy Gopal, Zoe Alcroft, Charlie Brooks and Rav Wilding race in moving podiums in a festive episode of The Finish Line to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Layton Williams, Emma Barton, Mark Pougatch, Karenjeet Kaur Bains and Dr Punam Krishan race in moving podiums in a festive episode of The Finish Line to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.
